mapper.select: select movie_seq , movie_title , movie_content , movie_img , movie_type , movie_open_date , movie_rating , movie_runtime , movie_actor , movie_country , admin_id , movie_director , movie_cnt , movie_participate from movies where movie_seq = #{movie_seq}

select m.movie_seq as movie_seq , m.movie_title as movie_title , m.movie_content as movie_content , m.movie_img as movie_img , m.movie_type as movie_type , m.movie_open_date as movie_open_date , m.movie_rating as movie_rating , m.movie_runtime as movie_runtime , m.movie_actor as movie_actor , m.movie_country as movie_country , m.admin_id as admin_id , m.movie_director as movie_director , m.movie_cnt as movie_cnt , m.movie_participate as movie_participate , count(c.cmt_seq) as cmt_seq from movies m,movie_comments c where c.movie_seq = m.movie_seq group by m.movie_seq,m.movie_title,m.movie_content ,m.movie_img,m.movie_type,m.movie_open_date,m.movie_rating ,m.movie_runtime,m.movie_actor,m.movie_country,m.admin_id ,m.movie_director,m.movie_cnt,m.movie_participate order by m.movie_seq desc limit 6
select movie_seq from movies where movie_type like concat('%', #{movie_type}, '%') order by movie_cnt desc

select m.movie_seq as movie_seq , m.movie_title as movie_title , m.movie_content as movie_content , m.movie_img as movie_img , m.movie_type as movie_type , m.movie_open_date as movie_open_date , m.movie_rating as movie_rating , m.movie_runtime as movie_runtime , m.movie_actor as movie_actor , m.movie_country as movie_country , m.admin_id as admin_id , m.movie_director as movie_director , m.movie_cnt as movie_cnt , m.movie_participate as movie_participate , count(c.cmt_seq) as cmt_seq from movies m,movie_comments c where m.movie_seq=#{seq} order by m.movie_cnt desc

select movie_seq , movie_title , movie_content , movie_img , movie_type , movie_open_date , movie_rating , movie_runtime , movie_actor , movie_country , admin_id , movie_director , movie_cnt , movie_participate from movies where movie_type like concat('%', #{movie_type}, '%') and movie_seq != #{movie_seq} order by movie_seq desc LIMIT 0,4

select m.movie_seq as movie_seq , m.movie_title as movie_title , m.movie_content as movie_content , m.movie_img as movie_img , m.movie_type as movie_type , m.movie_open_date as movie_open_date , m.movie_rating as movie_rating , m.movie_runtime as movie_runtime , m.movie_actor as movie_actor , m.movie_country as movie_country , m.admin_id as admin_id , m.movie_director as movie_director , m.movie_cnt as movie_cnt , m.movie_participate as movie_participate , count(c.cmt_seq) as cmt_seq from movies m,movie_comments c where c.movie_seq = m.movie_seq group by m.movie_seq,m.movie_title,m.movie_content ,m.movie_img,m.movie_type,m.movie_open_date,m.movie_rating ,m.movie_runtime,m.movie_actor,m.movie_country,m.admin_id ,m.movie_director,m.movie_cnt,m.movie_participate order by m.movie_participate asc limit 3
select movie_seq , movie_title , movie_content , movie_img from movies order by movie_cnt desc limit 1

select count(*) from movies
where movie_type like concat('%', #{movie_type}, '%')
select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as no, m.* from movies m limit #{firstRow},#{lastRow};
mapper.update: update movies set movie_participate = movie_participate + 1 , movie_rating = movie_rating + #{movie_rating}*2 / movie_participate where movie_seq = #{movie_seq}
